name: Friday Night Funkin' - Week 7 Tankman [ANDROID SUPPORT]
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' - Week 7 Tankman [ANDROID SUPPORT]
description:
Friday Night Funkin' Week 7, now downloadable on itch.io! I will delete this when week 7 gets released on its own itch.io page.

..I got lazy last time making the description, so here I go, giving more information about this file.

The .zip file is for devices with slower wifi, low-end devices, or devices with not that much space left. It's more lightweight and has optimized downloading speed. The mod support and cutscene files I've provided are the full FNF Week 7 experience. The difference between the two is quite self-explanatory. One has mod support and cutscenes, and the other doesn't.
